title: Smart Data Models. GTFS Schema - Agency

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be GtfsAgency. Enum:'GtfsAgency'

entitySource.description: Property. A sequence of characters giving the original source of the Entity data as a URL. It shall point to the URL of the original GTFS feed used to generate this Entity. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

timezone.description: Property. Same as GTFS `agency_timezone`. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. See [GTFS](https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference/#agencytxt)

language.description: Property. Same as GTFS `agency_language`. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. See [GTFS](https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs/reference/#agencytxt)
